content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-08400" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <!-- Spring component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-web" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring Boot component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-web" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring component in compiled application condition -->
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-web" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Web">
                    <description>The application embeds the Spring Web framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Web</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
